page.title: 19PERTON POETRY
page.content: About ten years ago Perton was just green fields and woodland. The machinery took over making a new area of houses and shops. More and more people came to live here and soon it was a noisy, cluttered development. Here is a poem which describes my feelings about it... The distant sounds of aeroplanes Coming in to land on the busy airfield The crushing noise of Bulldozers Churning the soil slowly over The machinery created a world Of cluttered houses and streets Cutting through the green fields Destroying the peaceful woods Bringing an atmosphere Of noisy traffic,crowded shops.
